name: RFI
description: Pixel is affected by RFI effects as identified in the AUX_RFILST or it has exceeded the BT thresholds.

name: SUN_TAILS
description: Pixel is located in the hexagonal alias directions centred on a Sun alias (if Sun is not removed, measurement may be degraded in these directions).

name: BORDER_FOV
description: Pixel is close to the border delimiting the Extended Alias free zone or to the unit circle replicas borders.

name: RFI_TAIL
description: Measurement is affected by the tails of a point source RFI as identified in the AUX RFI list (tail width is dependant on the RFI expected BT defined in the AUX RFILST).

name: AF_FOV
description: Pixel is inside the exclusive zone of Alias free.

name: MOON_POINT
description: Pixel is located in a zone where a Moon alias was reconstructed.

name: SUN_GLINT_AREA
description: Pixel is located in a zone where Sun reflection has been detected.

name: SUN_POINT
description: Pixel is located in a zone where a Sun alias was reconstructed.

name: RFI_MITIGATION
description: RFI mitigation has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel.

name: SINGLE_SNAPSHOT
description: Scene has not been combined with an adjacent scene in opposite polarisation during image reconstruction.

name: MOON_FV
description: Direct Moon correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel.

name: SUN_GLINT_FOV
description: Reflected Sun correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel.

name: SUN_FOV
description: Direct Sun correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel.
